${ModID}:SpiomesManifestationCutscene.NAME: SpiomesManifestation Cutscene
BLOCKING_TEXTS: The herald seems inert and unresponsive.
DESCRIPTIONS: You look at the headless figure. If you didn't know better you would say that the body is flat.
As you approach a voice manifests in your head.
"Welcome traveler. The biomes greet you. The resourceful ones will strive. Adapt and evolve."
As you look at the unstable ?Person? in front of you you get visions of strange and unique environments.
Three regions in particular stand out to you.
You decide to take a detour during your next day of travel.
You shake off the visions. You can not allow yourself to get distracted.
The voice manifests in your head again. Stronger this time. Forceful.
"Embrace the evolution. Struggle, overcome, adapt, evolve."
OPTIONS: [Embrace the vision] The next map will contain the {0} biome.
